General.Name: Palm Landscape Architecture Co Ltd
General.Description: Palm Eco-Town Development Co., Ltd engages in the design, planning, construction, and operation of eco-towns in China. It is also involved in the garden, engineering and landscape, and smart urban and rural construction businesses. The company was formerly known as Palm Landscape Architecture Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Palm Eco-Town Development Co., Ltd in April 2016. Palm Eco-Town Development Co., Ltd was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Guangzhou, China.
General.Address: Building B, R&F Yingsheng Plaza, Guangzhou, China, 510627
